atomica.ui.util
Class ImageLoader

java.lang.Object
  atomica.ui.util.ImageLoader

public class ImageLoader
extends java.lang.Object

Responsible for loading all images of the ui. This includes the token images as well as the field and background image. Implemented as singleton.

Author:
Georg Ludewig

getAtomImages

private java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Image> getAtomImages()
Returns all atom images. At first call all atom images are being loaded into memory.
